    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public static MultiMap<String,String> convert(javax.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap<String,String> map)
        Convert a (rs.core) MultivaluedMap to (our, local) MultiMap. This is just to allow bridging from Jersey restlets into our (eventually, Jersey-free internally) code.

        Empty parameters are silently ignored.

      • getAcceptableMediaTypes

        public static List<MediaType> getAcceptableMediaTypes(javax.ws.rs.core.HttpHeaders headers)
        Translate the Jersey media types into Elda media types (because there will be Jersey-less versions of Elda). Also, if text/html is present, prefer it regardless of the given order, for those browsers still out there that "prefer" XML to HTML. They may, but their readers don't.
